title: Godzilla (or Gojira)
summary: A 164-foot-tall (50-meter-tall) monster reptile with radioactive breath

title: King Kong
summary: A giant gorilla from the tropical location, Skull Island

title: Michael Wazowski
summary: Michael "Mike" Wazowski is the deuteragonist of the Monsters, Inc. franchise and the titular protagonist of Mike's New Car. He is Sulley's best friend, roommate, and assistant.

title: James P. Sullivan
summary: James P. "Sulley" Sullivan is the main protagonist of the Monsters, Inc. franchise. He is the current CEO of the company and Mike's best friend and roommate.
